parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "PNL" (Partidul Național Liberal) and "Ilie Bolojan".  Ilie Bolojan is a prominent member of the PNL, and this directly refers to a political party participating in the parliamentary elections. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting parameters (age, location) further confirm its intention to address a broad segment of the population. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The message "PNL și Ilie Bolojan – Alegerea pentru un Parlament al faptelor!" ("PNL and Ilie Bolojan – The choice for a Parliament of deeds!") clearly aims to promote the PNL and, by association, Ilie Bolojan. The objective is to influence voters to choose the PNL in the parliamentary elections. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It's a concise, promotional statement, not an analysis or news report. It does not provide balanced information or different perspectives.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The statement is not a personal opinion; it's a direct endorsement of a political party and candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1267675860939708</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate and party, targets a wide audience, and has a clear electoral objective: to promote the PNL and Ilie Bolojan.  The absence of a CMF number is not sufficient to negate this conclusion, especially given the explicit mention of the party and candidate. The post's timing is crucial; if it was published after the official end of the electoral campaign period, it would constitute a violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Ilie Bolojan</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PNL</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Mihaiță Negură, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 1267675860939708, care promovează PNL și Ilie Bolojan cu mesajul "PNL și Ilie Bolojan – Alegerea pentru un Parlament al faptelor!", având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acestora, constituind astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea campaniei. Postarea îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, referindu-se direct la un candidat și partid, adresându-se unui public larg și având un obiectiv electoral clar. Absența unui număr CMF nu exonerează de răspundere.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
